short_summary: A 750-hour contract to provide change management consultant and facilitation services for a project in the Vancouver metropolitan area.
description: The Canadian Wildlife Service is seeking professional services of a change management consultant and a facilitator consultant. The consultants are required to support overarching project management as well as meetings and workshop implementation.
full_summary:
# [Announcement of Business Consulting and Change Management Services Tender](#announcement-of-business-consulting-and-change-management-services-tender)

**Project Title**: Business Consulting / Change Management Stream

**Reference Number**: 5000-071245

**Amendment Number**: 5

## Project Overview
The Canadian Wildlife Service, a department within Environment and Climate Change Canada, is seeking to engage professional services of a change management consultant and a facilitator consultant.

**Project Details**

* **Region**: Vancouver Metropolitan Area
* **Estimated Period**: From the contract start date to February 28, 2025
* **Estimated Level of Effort**: 750 hours

### Description of Required Services
The selected consultants will support overarching project management, meetings, and workshop implementation. The services required include:

* Change management consultation
* Facilitation support

### Additional Information
- **Contract Category**: SRV
- **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Selective Tendering
- **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
- **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
- **Regions of Delivery**: Vancouver

### Contact Details
For any inquiries regarding this tender, please contact Heidi Noble at:

*   Phone: (289) 348-2015
*   Email: [Heidi.Noble@ec.gc.ca](mailto:Heidi.Noble@ec.gc.ca)

### Supporting Documents

*   English: 
    [Attachment](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/21616/npp_5000071245_en_0.pdf)
*   French:
    [Pièces jointes](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/21616/npp_5000071245_fr_0.pdf)

## Closing Date: 
The tender closing date is **October 25, 2023, at 6:00 pm EST**. All bids must be submitted by this date and time. Late bids will be rejected.		 

**Contracting Entity Contact Information:**

*   Environment and Climate Change Canada
*   867 Lakeshore Road, Burlington, Ontario, Canada, L7S 1A1
